resetPasswordText: No worries. Click the button below and check your email to reset it.
resetPasswordInstructions: Please enter the email address used to create this account. Click reset, and check your inbox for more instructions.
agreeToTerms: I have read and agree to the
termsOfUse: Pie for Providers Terms of Use
multiBusiness: Are you managing subsidy cases for multiple child care businesses?
multiBusinessFalse: No, I am managing 1 child care business only
multiBusinessTrue: Yes, managing multiple child care businesses
phoneNote: we will only call or text if you want us to
passwordInvalid: Password must be a minimum of 8 characters, and include numbers and letters
passwordConfirmationMatch: The two passwords that you entered do not match!
termsRequired: Please read and agree to our Terms of Service
emailVerificationText: We’ve sent you an email to verify your account.
restartSignup: Is {userEmail} your correct email without typos? If not, you can restart the signup process.
resendConfirmationEmail: Click here to resend the email.
gettingStartedBusinesses: Tell us about the businesses and sites you manage, so we know which subsidy payment rates to apply to your cases.
gettingStartedUpload: Upload a spreadsheet with the names and birthdays of the subsidy-eligible children you serve. In most cases, you can download this from other software you use. This helps us calculate each child's subsidy payment rate.
gettingStartedDetails: We'll need some more details about each subsidy case, like how many days the child was approved for. You can find most of this on the approval letter from the state. After you enter this, you'll only have to update once a year for most children.
gettingStartedAgencies: Let us know which agencies provide subsidies for which children, so we can keep track of your monthly billing cycles.
gettingStartedInstructions: Follow these instructions to set up your case dashboard. This should take about 15 minutes, and you'll only have to do this once. Get ready to increase your slice of the pie!
genericErrorMessage: Something went wrong, try again later.
unauthenticated: You need to sign in or sign up before continuing.
alreadyConfirmed: You have already verified your account. You can now log in.
emailUnconfirmed: You have to confirm your email address before continuing.
genericEmailConfirmationError: We've run into a problem confirming your email.
resetPasswordRequestSuccess: You will receive an email with instructions on how to reset your password in a few minutes.
mustUseConfirmationEmail: You must confirm your account using a confirmation link sent to your email address.
requestNewConfirmation: You may request a new confirmation email using this link:
genericConfirmationTokenError: We've run into a problem with your confirmation token.
genericConfirmationError: There was an unknown problem with your confirmation.
passwordResetTokenBlank: Your password reset token is blank. You must click on the reset password link sent to your email address.
passwordResetTokenInvalid: Your password reset token is invalid. Please request a new one.
passwordResetTokenExpired: Your password reset token has expired. Please request a new one.
uploadCasesInvalidFileFormat: Invalid file format. Supported formats: CSV, XLS, and XLSX
revenueProjections: Real-time revenue projections based on attendance data.
potentialRevenueDef: Based on attendance expected for the rest of the month
maxApprovedRevenueDef: If all families meet 80% attendance rate
attendanceRateDef: Based on attendance rate of all children listed
